headline: Ana's Copenhagen
bodyText:
Back in 2017, Ditte and Nicolaj asked good friend and #GANNIGirl, artist and photographer Ana Kraš to come and photograph their favourite places to act as a love letter to Copenhagen.

Capturing charming everyday scenes and magical moments from the vast Royal Horse Stables to plates smørrebrød sandwiches at the legendary café Gitte Kik. The photographs provided the backdrop to our FW18 show and still live on in the changing rooms of our stores today.
